thread.title: Plymouth Country Inn & Suites reopens after $4M renovation (Photos)
thread.title_full: Plymouth Country Inn & Suites reopens after $4M renovation (Photos)

author: Cody Nelson
title: Plymouth Country Inn & Suites reopens after $4M renovation (Photos)
text:
The Country Inn & Suites in Plymouth reopened with a new look. The Country Inn & Suites in Plymouth is now open after a $4 million facelift. Often dubbed the chain's Minneapolis West location, the hotel now has more contemporary design features, an expanded breakfast and a fire pit outside. Room rates start at $129 per night and go up to $194 for an extended-stay, one-bedroom suite, according to the hotel's website. Minnetonka-based Carlson owns the Country Inn & Suites brand and is Minnesota's fifth-largest private company, according to Business Journal research .
